name: react-webpack-babel-hotreload-example
description: Example application for setting up React, React Router, Redux, Material-UI, Webpack, Babel, and React Hot Loader
author: Pham Thanh Tu <tubackkhoa@gmail.com>

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_PATH=client NODE_ENV=test tape --require babel-register client/**/*.spec.js | tap-spec || true
scripts.sass: node-sass stylesheets/main.scss public/assets/main.css && node-sass --watch stylesheets/main.scss --output public/assets
scripts.server: cross-env PORT=3000 nodemon -e js,jsx,jade,pug --watch server server/index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env PORT=7000 NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch .babelrc --watch webpack-dev-server.js --watch webpack.config.js webpack-dev-server.js
scripts.bundle: node-sass stylesheets/main.scss --output-style compressed public/assets/main.css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
